channel.title: Art on lavafroth
channel.description: Recent content in Art on lavafroth

item.title: Amateur Blender Sculpture
item.description: This is my first time trying out sculpting in blender, so forgive me for the quality of the sculpt. I’m still pretty much in the learning stage. Big thank you to Nichole Sebastian for the reference photo. Also apologies if the empty eye sockets gave you a jumpscare.

item.title: Drowning
item.description: A cyborg head sinking in a pool of water. What more did you expect? Here’s a timelapse.

item.title: This Error
item.description: My first hand drawn YouTube thumbnail, I’m might continue using lawyer ferris as my mascot both due to ferris being in the public domain as well as the sheer memeworthiness of the debacle.

item.title: Throwing knives
item.description: An unfinished animation with a focus on anatomy. Thank you Polina Tankilevitch for the reference video.

item.title: Truce
item.description: A painting of the lead vocalist of Twenty Øne Piløts, named after one of my favorite songs from their album Vessel.
